subject: Football
lead_paragraph: A nearly singular spotlight has been on Eli Manning since he was chosen first over all in the 2004 N.F.L. draft and anointed the Giants’ franchise quarterback after he was acquired from San Diego.
snippet: A nearly singular spotlight has been on Eli Manning since he was chosen first over all in the 2004 N.F.L. draft and anointed the Giants’ franchise quarterback after he was acquired from San Diego.
